other_tests.findings: No malignant cells, elevated protein levels (419 mg/dl initially, 580 mg/dl on repeat, 870 mg/dl subsequently) and low glucose levels (15 mg/dl initially, 18 mg/dl on repeat, 41 mg/dl subsequently)
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeated lumbar punctures showed progressive elevation of protein levels and persistently low glucose levels.

other_tests.findings: Intermittent generalized background slowing, without epileptiform activity

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsy of right frontal meninges and brain
other_tests.findings: Leptomeningeal fibrosis and reactive gliosis in the cortex; cultures were sterile.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings indicative of prior meningitis progression noted, but cultured results remained negative throughout.

other_tests.procedure_name: Craniotomy for biopsy and possible excision
other_tests.findings: Markedly cellular neoplasm revealed, consistent with glioblastoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient's condition deteriorated rapidly following this procedure.
